dt: {bc}of, relating to, resembling, or suggesting an {d_link|orgasm|orgasm:1}

dt.t: … breaking down the barrier between the ersatz classism of the game and the pure {wi}orgasmic{/wi} fun of finding the racquet's sweet spot.
The sound track naturally resounds with the {wi}orgasmic{/wi} hammering of the Lewis beat, wails with the simple, not to say crude, sexual metaphors of his lyrics.

dt: {bc}characterized by or tending to produce an orgasm

dt.t: Most mums-to-be don't associate going into labour with the prospect of imminent pleasure, but some mums say their experience of childbirth was {wi}orgasmic{/wi}.
… the fans … are reacting as if Williams' abilities trigger something verging on the {wi}orgasmic{/wi}.

shortdef: of, relating to, resembling, or suggesting an orgasm
characterized by or tending to produce an orgasm

dt: {bc}capable of having more than one {d_link|orgasm|orgasm:1} during a single period of sexual activity

dt.t: American doctors have studied the experiences of {wi}multi-orgasmic{/wi} men who had from two to nine orgasms per session.
The gradual anatomical and functional changes leave the older woman sexually advantaged as compared to the older man—she remains responsive, as {wi}multiorgasmic{/wi} as she was.

dt: {bc}of, relating to, or characterized by multiple orgasms

shortdef: capable of having more than one orgasm during a single period of sexual activity; also : of, relating to, or characterized by multiple orgasms
